news_header: Eden Knight, a Saudi trans woman, took her life after being persuaded to return to Saudi Arabia by a lawyer linked to her family, despite seeking asylum in the US.
news_original_title: Lawyer in Saudi trans student's suicide note had embassy links, BBC finds
news_text: Eden Knight, a prominent Saudi trans woman, posted a heartbreaking suicide note on X, revealing that a lawyer, Bader Alomair, convinced her to return to Saudi Arabia after she sought asylum in the US. Eden had transitioned while studying in the US and found acceptance online, but faced immense pressure upon returning home. Her note indicated that Alomair, who has ties to the Saudi embassy, was working with her family against her interests. After returning, Eden experienced harassment and abuse, leading to her tragic decision to end her life on March 12, 2023.
